subject: INFORMATION!!!
body:
Debt Management Office
Chairman of Debt Reconciliation
Mr. Patrick Egobia
No 133 Mambilla Street ,Off Aso Drive
Maitama District Abuja Nigeria.
e-mail: patrick.egobia@yahoo.com

Attention: Beneficiary,

This is to notify you that the Nigeria Government in collaboration with The World Bank and the Central Bank of Nigeria has mapped out the sum of US$1Billion Dollars to compensate all scam victims, in offsetting debts that arose from contract jobs, inheritance, and major trade funds executed in the past by foreign contractors. These countries include Ghana, Benin, South Africa, Nigeria, etc.

To this effect a special committee was set up by the Nigeria Government and World Bank with a compiled list of all scam victims to be Compensated. Under this scheme each victim in the list will receive the sum of Two Million, Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars Only for compensation and it will be carried out in three phases.

We are contacting you to reconfirm your contact information as specified below:

First Name:
Last Name:
Contact Address:
State Of Origin:
City:
Occupation:
Marital Status:
Country:
Date of birth
Email:
Telephone:
Cell Phone:
Scanned copy of your ID:

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Yous Faithfully,

Debt Management Office
Chairman of Debt Reconciliation
Mr. Patrick Egobia
No 133 Mambilla Street ,Off Aso Drive
Maitama District Abuja Nigeria.
